task.title: Configure the non-XA database driver
task.shortdesc: Use the Resources menu to add and configure the non-XA database driver.

step.cmd: Select New to add a new driver. This will open a configuration screen.
Select Oracle from the the list in the Database type drop down supplied.
Select Oracle JDBC Driver from the list in the Provider type drop down supplied.
Select the Connection pool data source from the list in the Implementation type drop down supplied.
Set the Name field to be Oracle JDBC Driver, if not filled in automatically.
Review the Class path and ensure the ORACLE_JDBC_DRIVER_PATH environment variable is correct. Select Next to continue.
Review the properties on the configuration screen that opens. There should be no need to change any of them.
Select Finish to confirm the changes.
